casebody.data:
BIO-MEDICAL APPLICATIONS OF NORTH CAROLINA, INC. v. N.C. DEPT. OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES. No. COA05-820. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed April 18, 2006. Certification Date May 8, 2006. Appeal from the Dept. of Health & Human Services (04DHR516).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed.
